title: #173: The Curious Case Of Nick Pope
description:
Thank you for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we welcome former MI6 and UFO "Expert" Nick Pope and it's a weirdest episodes ever. To be honest, I have no clue what happen in this show. Enjoy it!
